data.message: How about being philantropic here at home, instead of Africa?  Looks of poverty and illness here, Mark!

replies.message: So true.  Celebs like to do "world issues" for the greater publicity.  Wish they would spend their money here, along with fundraising for sicknesses plaguing Americans.
Yes.  Raise funds for Americans.  Better yet, donate your megabucks to sickness and poverty here at home, Mr. Z.
I donate only to American causes because only American charities are held accountable for the money they raise.  Guess Zuckerberg is trying for a Nobel Prize -

So true.  Think Haiti.  Think UN programs.  No accountability with foreign agencies, especially on the African continent.  I say this is more self-promotion that serious cause.  Wish he would get excited about the problems many Americans face.
Facebook is a global company with revenue coming in from all around the world, not just the US, therefore it makes sense to focus on global issues where all the users can be engaged.
